EmailTemplate.subject: Meet your grid challenges with built-in intelligence and agility
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
View as web page <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> Empowered for the new energy future Get the most from your assets as you move to a smarter grid To build a smarter grid, you need intelligent solutions that make it easier to manage your valuable assets, measure their performance and protect them from cyberattacks throughout their lifecycle. Learn how the Nokia Bell Labs Future X architecture <[[https://tools.ext.nokia.com/onestore?asset=205703&did=d000000001d6&utm_campaign=util_architecture&utm_source=nurture&utm_medium=email&utm_content=email1-future-x-for-ind&utm_term=power_util]]> for power utilities can help you use machine learning analytics and predictive maintenance to secure your grid, increase its agility and ensure that your assets always perform at their best. Find out how to Empower your power utility for the new energy future https://networks.nokia.com/empowered <[[https://networks.nokia.com/empowered?did=d000000001d6&utm_campaign=util_architecture&utm_source=nurture&utm_medium=email&utm_content=email1-future-x-for-ind&utm_term=power_util]]> © {{my.CopyrightYear}} Nokia.
